title: Ginger paste

ingredients.content: 200 g fresh ginger, peeled and cut into pieces (2 cm)
50 g olive oil, plus extra for preserving (approx. 30 g)

preparations.content: Place ginger and salt into mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add oil and mix <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Transfer into a sterilised sealable storage jar or container. Top with extra oil over surface of paste to preserve and use as needed (see Tips).

hintsAndTricks: To keep your paste fresh and to avoid spoiling, measure out the required amount using a clean dry spoon. Then top with more oil to preserve, cover and place back into the refrigerator immediately. Do not leave paste out while cooking.
Ginger paste can be stored in the refrigerator for up to 4 weeks in a steralised sealable storage jar or container, or in ice cube trays in the freezer for up to 6 months.
